import React, { Component } from "react"; // import egg from "./img/egg.jpeg"; import axios from "axios"; import './stylesheets/Profile.css' class Profile extends Component { avatar = ''; username = ''; getCAvatar = () => { axios.defaults.headers.post['Access-Control-Allow-Origin'] = '*'; axios.get('http://localhost:8000/api/avatar', {withCredentials: true} ) .then(response => { this.avatar = response.data; }) .catch(error => console.error(error)); } getUsername = () => { axios.defaults.headers.post['Access-Control-Allow-Origin'] = '*'; axios.get('http://localhost:8000/api/username', {withCredentials: true}) .then(response => { this.username = response.data; }) .catch(error => console.error(error)); } render() { console.log('avatar: ',this.avatar); return (
{this.username}
